trans-unit.source: Serializes a connector layout.
trans-unit.target: Serializa um esquema de conector.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class is also useful for customizing the serialization of connectors of classes derived from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Esta classe também é útil para personalizar a serialização dos conectores de classes derivadas de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorLayoutSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorLayoutSerializer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified <xref:System.Type> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância especificada do <xref:System.Type>utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> supporting this operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que suportam esta operação.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> especificado

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> especificado

trans-unit.source: type is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: typeé uma referência nula ().

trans-unit.source: Gets a Dictionary collection filled with element name and their associated values from the current position in the xml reader associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de dicionário preenchida com o nome de elemento e os respetivos valores associados da posição atual no leitor de xml associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gere o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> especificado

trans-unit.source: Dictionary based collection containing the argument names and their associated values for the construction of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Dicionário baseia coleção que contém os nomes de argumento e os respetivos valores associados para a construção do conector.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about all properties associated with the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações sobre todas as propriedades associado ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gere o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to search for properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para procurar as propriedades.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A array that contains information about the properties associated with obj.
trans-unit.target: A matriz que contenha informações sobre as propriedades associadas obj .

trans-unit.source: serializationManager or obj contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: serializationManagerou obj contém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs processing of the object after the deserialization process.
trans-unit.target: Efetua o processamento do objeto após o processo de anulação da serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"></xref> that manages the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager"> </xref> que gere o processo de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that was deserialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que foi anulada a serialização.</xref:System.Object>
